amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that pipeline modifications receive a thorough environmental review process.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in part B of House Report 113-492 to ensure that pipeline modifications receive a thorough environmental review process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 234 (Roll no. 352).
